snippet.title: Arma 3 Creator DLC: S.O.G. Prairie Fire - Launch Trailer | Vietnam War
snippet.description:
Get ready to experience the brutal intensity of the Vietnam War on a monumental scale. The Arma 3 Creator DLC: S.O.G. Prairie Fire is OUT NOW on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1227700/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=launch-trailer&utm_campaign=a3-sogpf-launch&utm_content=a3fLU-m8ttM

"S.O.G. Prairie Fire" features a new 300 km2 terrain, 4 factions, 100+ weapons/vehicles, co-op campaign for up to 14 players, SP/MP scenarios, and more.

Check out our official store ➡ https://store.bistudio.com/

Buy Arma 3 Creator DLC: S.O.G. Prairie Fire on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1227700/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=launch-trailer&utm_campaign=a3-sogpf-launch&utm_content=a3fLU-m8ttM

About Creator DLC
S.O.G. Prairie Fire is released as an Arma 3 Creator DLC, which means it's made by a third-party developer (Savage Game Design) and published by Bohemia Interactive. To learn more about this initiative, please visit http://www.arma3.com/dlc/creator#FAQ.

About Arma 3
Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox. Authentic, diverse, open – Arma 3 sends you to war.

Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/ArmaPlatform
Twitter - http://twitter.com/ArmaPlatform​
YouTube - http://youtube.com/ArmaPlatform
Discord - https://discord.com/invite/arma 
Steam - http://steamcommunity.com/app/107410

About Savage Game Design
Savage Game Design is a newly formed studio that includes over 100 creators who helped develop popular Arma 3 content, including the Arma 3 Jets DLC, and mods like Unsung Vietnam War, JSRS sounds, Icebreakr terrains, NI Arms, and many other Arma community releases since 2006. Advised by former members of US Special Forces who served in MACV-SOG, this passionate and dedicated Arma 3 Creator DLC team aims to deliver a highly authentic and memorable Vietnam War gaming experience.

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/savagegamegroup
Twitter - https://twitter.com/SavageGameDes
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwwNhHmwOgqJ2cliZ1yi2FA

Trailer Credits
Footage, editing, and music by Savage Game Design.

#Arma3 #DLC #VietnamWar
